Method Detail

getInScope

public java.lang.Object getInScope(ResolutionContext context,
                                   WiringQuery query,
                                   Resolver resolver)
Description copied from interface: Scope
Obtain the specified object from this scope. If the object is not in the scope, use the resolver to retrieve it , and then put in the scope.

Parameters:
context - the resolution context
query - the procured object specification
resolver - the resolver to create the object if it is not in scope.
Returns:

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from interface: Scope
Remove all objects from scope.

remove

public void remove(java.lang.Object object)
Description copied from interface: Scope
Remove the specified object from the scope.
